title: Journalist Interview Quote Summarizer
description: Upload interview transcripts or paste text from interviews to extract key quotes and summarize main points, helping journalists quickly identify impactful soundbites and story angles.
inputLabel: Paste interview text or upload transcript files
outputLabel: Key quotes and summary of main interview points
systemPrompt: You are an assistant helping journalists analyze interview transcripts. Extract the most impactful and quotable statements, then generate a concise summary highlighting the main themes and insights from the interview text provided.
